articles.title: Is the Sun going through mid-life crisis? Here's what European space study reveals - India TV News
articles.description: Sun mid-life crisis: Sun has entered its middle age, estimated to be around 4.57 billion years. The study was conducted with the help of data collected by the Gaia spacecraft.
articles.content:
• A study by ESA has revealed that Sun is going through a mid-life crisis.
  • According to ESA, the sun is currently bursting with solar flares.
